description:
Buongiorno! 

Learn Italian with 'Ciao Italian Course' by iLoveLingo.com! 

It is fun, fast and easy, and will teach you the language of romance in no time. Whether you want to learn some basic Italian or really get serious with the lingo, you've come to the right place! 

FEATURES: 
- Easy, fun and fast, yet very comprehensive.
- Listen to 200 recorded phrases and words.
- Giovanni is your animated and dancing guide. 
- Varying exercises with text, audio, and images.
- No internet needed - study anywhere! 
- For all ages - both homeschooling and adult learning.

For a full description and more screenshots, please visit:
www.ilovelingo.com

Benvenuto!
versionNote: - Fixed inaudible sound in lesson 1, pronunciation.
